sentence.Network_en: He has said he will use all the weapons at his disposal.
sentence.Network_cn: 他放出话说他将使出十八般武艺。

sentence.Network_en: A few hours later bomb disposal experts defused the devices.
sentence.Network_cn: 几小时以后拆弹专家拆除了该爆炸装置的引信。

sentence.Network_en: They've stooped to using any and every weapon at their disposal.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们已经无耻到把能用的武器都用上了。

jx.jx_en_mean: available for one to use whenever or however one wishes

lj.lj_ly: a helicopter was put at their disposal.
lj.lj_ls: 一架直升飞机供他们支配。

jx.jx_en_mean: ready to assist the person concerned in any way they wish

lj.lj_ly: I am at your disposal until Sunday.
lj.lj_ls: 我在星期日前听你调遣。

entry.tran: 任…处理;供…任意使用;由…自由支配
entry.def: If you have something at your disposal, you are able to use it whenever you want, and for whatever purpose you want. If you say that you are at someone's disposal, you mean that you are willing to help them in any way you can.

example.ex: Do you have this information at your disposal?...
example.tran: 你对这个情况有所了解吗？

example.ex: He has said he will use all the weapons at his disposal...
example.tran: 他放出话说他将使出十八般武艺。

entry.tran: (废物等的)丢掉，清理，销毁，处理
entry.def: Disposal is the act of getting rid of something that is no longer wanted or needed.

example.ex: ...methods for the permanent disposal of radioactive wastes.
example.tran: 处理放射性废料的一劳永逸的办法

means.word_mean: 1. the power to use something or someone;

sentences.sentence: "used all the resources at his disposal"

means.word_mean: 2. a method of tending to (especially business) matters
3. the act or means of getting rid of something
4. a kitchen appliance for disposing of garbage

auth_sentence.content: Proper disposal could be to spread it back out.
auth_sentence.res_content: Proper disposal could be to spread it back out.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Proper disposal could be to spread it back out.

auth_sentence.content: Pellegrini still has experience at his disposal too.
auth_sentence.res_content: Pellegrini still has experience at his disposal too.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Pellegrini still has experience at his disposal too.

auth_sentence.content: He had a personal fortune at his disposal.
auth_sentence.res_content: He had a personal fortune at his disposal.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He had a personal fortune at his disposal.

kd.ZH: 任某人处理，供某人使用

Sentence.sentence: Typically, parents have fewer technological resources at their disposal than do schools.

means.word_mean: 清除, 处理, 处置

sentences.en: The safe disposal of nuclear waste is a major problem.
sentences.cn: 安全处置核废料是个大问题。

sentences.en: You had better discuss with her the disposal of the furniture.
sentences.cn: 你最好和她讨论一下如何布置家具。

jushi.english: The safe disposal of nuclear waste is a major problem.
jushi.chinese: 安全处理核废料是个大问题。

jushi.english: You had better discuss with her the disposal of the furniture.
jushi.chinese: 你最好和她讨论一下如何布置家具。

jushi.english: Please see to the disposal of that rubbish.
jushi.chinese: 请负责处理掉那堆垃圾。
